title: New Device
cancelDeviceCreationMessage: Are you sure you want to abandon the registration process? ALL data will be lost!

templatesStep.hint: To get started, select a template in the list below or create a new one!

attrsStep.hint: Now you can set static attribute values for your device!

securityStep.hint: In this step you generate or select a certificate to make your device more secure.
securityStep.cannotCreateMoreCertificates: You can only create one certificate while creating a device

summaryStep.title: Review the templates, certificates and give a name to your device
summaryStep.hint: If you notice that something is missing, just go back, correct and continue!
summaryStep.deviceNameHint: We're almost there, finally, give your device a name!
summaryStep.certificateAndKeysHint: (IMPORTANT: the keys will not be stored, so it is necessary to download them)
